With his louche air and a developed taste for smoking, gambling, port and women, itÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s hard to believe Cis Farringdon is only fourteen. And thatÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s because he isnÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t. Agatha his mother lopped five years from her true age and his when she married the amiable Posket.

The imminent arrival of CisÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ godfather sends Agatha incognito to the HÃƒÂ´tel des Princes to warn him of her deception. But itÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s also where her son has cajoled his otherwise staid stepfather into joining him for a binge.
